mapper.select: SELECT c.commodityId,c.subPrice,c.barCode,c.commodityDes,c.priceSpecification,c.commodityName,c.commodityNo,c.imgMain,c.imgOther,c.specification,c.inPrice/100 inPrice, c.salePrice/100 salePrice,c.tag,c.categoryId,c.info,c.weight,c.commodityStatus,c.unit,c.stockNum,c.taxRate, c.status,c.addTime,c.updateTime,c.commodityBanner,c.origin,c.supply,c.hint,c.grade,c.country,c.type,c.storage,t.categoryName FROM t_commodity c LEFT JOIN t_category t ON c.categoryId=t.categoryId order by c.addTime desc
SELECT categoryId,categoryName,parentId FROM t_category WHERE type='FL' AND parentId !='0' and status=1
SELECT categoryId,categoryName,parentId FROM t_category WHERE type='FL' AND parentId ='0' and status=1
SELECT categoryId,categoryName,parentId FROM t_category WHERE categoryId=#{0}
SELECT categoryId,categoryName FROM t_category WHERE type='BQ' and status=1

SELECT c.commodityId,c.priceSpecificationUnit,c.subPrice,c.subPriceUnit,c.barCode,c.priceSpecification,c.commodityDes,c.commodityName,c.commodityNo,c.imgMain,c.imgOther,c.specification,c.inPrice/100 inPrice, c.salePrice/100 salePrice,c.tag,c.categoryId,c.info,c.weight,c.commodityStatus,c.unit,c.stockNum,c.taxRate, c.status,c.addTime,c.updateTime,c.commodityBanner,c.origin,c.supply,c.hint,c.grade,c.country,c.type,c.storage,t.categoryName FROM t_commodity c LEFT JOIN t_category t ON c.categoryId=t.categoryId WHERE 1=1
AND commodityId =#{commodityId}
SELECT commodityName, barCode FROM t_commodity WHERE commodityNo = #{0}
select unit from t_commodity GROUP BY unit
